title: Analyze_videos can't find video path (formatting issue)

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
**Versions**
OS: Windows 10 x64
DeepLabCut Version 2.0.9

**Description**

Hi, I trained my network on an AWS and was able to successfully sync it via github with my windows machine in the hopes of using it to analyze videos. However, when I run analyze_videos, it continuously gives me the error of "No video was found in the path/ or single video with path:" I've rewritten the code and the paths many times and tried it on a totally different computer, and still received an error message. 

My files, with the path of the folder containing them:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31422484/66927319-98277d80-effd-11e9-8092-650edb33377e.png)



Trying with avi files
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31422484/66927155-51d21e80-effd-11e9-8d03-8884ec01781d.png)

Trying with mp4 files
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31422484/66927474-dfae0980-effd-11e9-9bac-4be1225e8230.png)

Searching for mp4 files by changing "video" path to include the full folder and not just a single file:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31422484/66927546-f81e2400-effd-11e9-8d53-d37cea31fcfb.png)


My config file:
```# Project definitions (do not edit)
Task: Reaching
scorer: Parth
date: Oct7

# Project path (change when moving around)
project_path: C:/Users/Parth/Desktop/DNN-Pose-Estimation/Reaching-Parth-2019-10-07 #gitignore

# Annotation data set configuration (and individual video cropping parameters)
video_sets:
    C:/Users/parth/Desktop/DNN-Pose-Estimation/Videos/rat1.mp4: #gitignore
    crop: 121, 516, 143, 412
bodyparts:
- bodypart1
- bodypart2
- bodypart3
- objectA
start: 0
stop: 1
numframes2pick: 20

# Plotting configuration
skeleton:
- - bodypart1
  - bodypart2
- - objectA
  - bodypart3
skeleton_color: black
pcutoff: 0.1
dotsize: 12
alphavalue: 0.7
colormap: jet

# Training,Evaluation and Analysis configuration
TrainingFraction:
- 0.95
iteration: 0
resnet: 50
snapshotindex: -1
batch_size: 8

# Cropping Parameters (for analysis and outlier frame detection)
cropping: false
#if cropping is true for analysis, then set the values here:
x1: 0
x2: 640
y1: 277
y2: 624

# Refinement configuration (parameters from annotation dataset configuration also relevant in this stage)
corner2move2:
- 50
- 50
move2corner: true
```

My files are saved as "rat1.mp4," "rat1.avi," and "rat2.mp4". 

Would you be able to assist me with this? Thank you!
